data.title: Prime Video: Boot Hill
data.meta_description: The exceptional Spaghetti Western duo Bud Spencer and Terence Hill star in the last episode of director Giuseppe Colizzi's western trilogy. Through swindling, murder and terror, Fisher and his gang have managed to get their hands on the important gold-yielding land in the area. Cat Stevens and Hutch Bessy join forces with circus performers and townsfolk to fight against Fisher and his henchmen.
data.text:
Boot Hill

The exceptional Spaghetti Western duo Bud Spencer and Terence Hill star in the last episode of director Giuseppe Colizzi's western trilogy. Through swindling, murder and terror, Fisher and his gang have managed to get their hands on the important gold-yielding land in the area. Cat Stevens and Hutch Bessy join forces with circus performers and townsfolk to fight against Fisher and his henchmen.

IMDb 5.51 h 21 min1972

NR
